content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5), and small electric poles at various positions.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (not found) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (not found) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (not found) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (not found) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab(position x=2.5, y=0.5), connected to a power source with electricity group(id=5663), and various chests and burners.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure the entity has available space before attempting to insert items.
-  Make sure the entity can accept the item being inserted.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity or water.
-  Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to other entities.

### Errors when setting entity recipes
-  Ensure the entity is a building that can have its recipe or filter set.

### Errors when placing offshore pumps
-  Ensure there is an offshore pump in the inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using prototypes
-  Ensure the prototype exists and is correctly referenced before attempting to use it.

### Errors when connecting entities to power sources
-  Ensure the entity is connected to a valid power source and has a valid electrical id.
